definition: lit. love the house and its crow (idiom); involvement with sb and everyone connected/Love me, love my dog.
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1],個|个[ge4]
and/to reach/up to/in time for
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
crow/black

sentences.english: Jessie: Is that what they say love me love my dog?
sentences.chinese: 这就是所说的爱屋及乌吧。

sentences.english: Find a way to become part of those things that are of most interest to them, and you will have found a way to become part of their life.
sentences.chinese: 爱屋及乌，你很快就会成为他们生活的一部分。

sentences.english: Accept and love each others' family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 爱屋及乌，爱相互的家庭和朋友。

sentences.english: It was a case of love me, love my dog.
sentences.chinese: 这真是一个爱屋及乌的例子。

sentences.english: It was a case of love me, love my dog, she wouldn't go unless he was invited.
sentences.chinese: 这是件爱屋及乌之事，她不会去除非他被邀请了。

sentences.english: You know they say, "Love your wife love her dog".
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，他们说“爱屋及乌”。

sentences.english: My parents love me a lot and I am happy, but I'm scared.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母爱屋及乌了很多，我很高兴，但我怕。

definition: to dote on sb
to love dearly
to treat sb favorably/to view in a new light
extremely (placed after verb or adjective)
docile and obedient/all obedience
the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
totally submissive (idiom)
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to be hell-bent on/dead set on sth/unswerving
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to love dearly
to favor/to prefer/to show favoritism
deeply attached/devoted
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
lit. in the eyes of a lover appears 西施[Xi1 shi1] (idiom); fig. beauty is in the eye of the beholder
pinyin: qing2 ren2 yan3 li3 chu1 Xi1 shi1

definition: to adapt to sb's taste/to fit sb's fancy
